member.name: M:RepositAPI.Controllers.AuthorController.Get
member.summary: Returns all Authors with their details

member.name: M:RepositAPI.Controllers.AuthorController.Get(System.Int32)

member.name: M:RepositAPI.Controllers.AuthorController.Post(RepositAPI.Models.Author)
member.param: Required. Do not include an explicit id in the body. Name field is required.
member.returns: 201 Created status and new Author's details
